plugins.name: Figma to React by Figroot
plugins.description:
Instantly turn Figma into a pixel-perfect, responsive React and Tailwind CSS website. Saves you 10x time, completely for free. This tool is intended for Design Engineers to speed up their workflow immensely.


Watch the demo video here.


Features

  1. Image download button for all images within the selection.
  2. Font support that automatically detects and adds the fonts needed.
  3. Tailwind custom config support for fonts (variables WIP).
  4. We are continuing to improve the experimental Responsive Screen setting.


How to use

  1. Click the Figma screen
  2. Copy the generated code
  3. Paste the code into page.tsx or any component your app.
  4. Paste the generated fonts and tailwind code into the corresponding files.
  5. Viola! Pixel-perfect code!


How to set up the React website

Below are the instructions to run your own React website, using Next.js and Tailwind CSS.


  1. Download Node.js (LTS) from the official website here.
  2. Next, install TypeScript using the command in your terminal: npm install -g typescript
  3. Create a Next.js app using the command in your terminal: npx create-next-app@latest
  4. Name your project your-project-name.
  5. On installation, spam enter to use the default settings for the prompts.
  6. Download Visual Studio Code here.
  7. Open Visual Studio Code, click File > Open Folder > your-project-name
  8. In the upper left, click Terminal (it could be hidden in the 3 dots), then New Terminal.
  9. In the Terminal, type npm i, then npm run dev.
  10. Hold ctrl and click the link next to Local:, should look something like: http://localhost:3000
  11. Congrats! Your Next.js app is running.
plugins.tagline: Turn Figma into a React and Tailwind CSS website for free

130671.tagline: Turn Figma into a React and Tailwind CSS website for free

plugins.name: Sticky to Shape
plugins.description:
This plugin allows you to seamlessly convert FigJam Sticky notes into square shapes with text. It's perfect for organizing brainstorming sessions or visually aligning your ideas.


How to Use:

Select one or more Sticky notes in your FigJam file.

Run the plugin to transform them into square shapes with the same text content.

Customize the resulting shape's color, size, and text properties as needed.


Key Features:

Automatically transforms Sticky notes into square shapes with text.

Retains the original text and formatting.

Helps maintain visual consistency in your FigJam files.

Whether you're collaborating with teammates or organizing your thoughts visually, this plugin simplifies the process and saves time.
plugins.tagline: Transform FigJam Stickies into square shapes with text in just one click.

plugins.name: Design Tokens to Variables
plugins.description:
Convert JSON data using W3C Design Tokens specs or formats generated by generators into Figma Variables, supporting multiple modes.


🔑 Key Features


  1. Effortless JSON conversion: Quickly transform W3C-compliant JSON design tokens into Figma Variables.
  2. Multi-mode support: Easily manage light and dark for versatile design systems.
  3. Intelligent grouping: Automatically organize your variables into logical groups for better management.
  4. Wide compatibility: Works with W3C design tokens specs, Leonardo, Huetone, and Primer Prism formats.


✅ Perfect for


  1. Design system managers streamlining their workflow.
  2. Designers working on multi-themed applications.
  3. Teams transitioning from traditional design tokens to Figma variables.


🟡 Supported tokens


  1. Tested only for colors at the moment.


🐞 Got ideas or found a bug?


Comment or contact me in Threads. Your feedback helps make this plugin even better for everyone!
plugins.tagline: Convert W3C Design Tokens, Leonardo, Huetone, Primer Prism to Variables.

plugins.name: Color cleaner: Merge similar colors & connect with variables
plugins.description:
About

Color Cleaner is a plugin designed to help streamline your Figma files not only by reducing the number of colors and minimizing subtle variations of the same shade, but also connecting them with variables.


How to use

Use the “Level of cleanup” slider to adjust how much cleanup is applied. Preview the changes in the box below and choose a setting that balances effectiveness. Typically, aim for a setting that is neither too soft to make a noticeable difference, nor too hard to avoid merging distinct colors.

Toggle the “Match with variables” checkbox if you want colors to be connected with available variables. When ready, click “Clean.” After a brief moment, the changes will be applied to the selected element.

accepted.name: Ruslan Maslenkou
accepted.description: Pragmatic product designer with 5+ years of experience designing interfaces for web and mobile applications in devtools, fintech, and crypto products.

plugins.tagline: Merge similar color shades together and connect with variables in 1 click

135408.name: Color cleaner: Merge similar colors & connect with variables
135408.description:
About

Color Cleaner is a plugin designed to help streamline your Figma files not only by reducing the number of colors and minimizing subtle variations of the same shade, but also connecting them with variables.


How to use

Use the “Level of cleanup” slider to adjust how much cleanup is applied. Preview the changes in the box below and choose a setting that balances effectiveness. Typically, aim for a setting that is neither too soft to make a noticeable difference, nor too hard to avoid merging distinct colors.

Toggle the “Match with variables” checkbox if you want colors to be connected with available variables. When ready, click “Clean.” After a brief moment, the changes will be applied to the selected element.

manifest.name: Color cleaner: Merge similar colors & convert to variables

135408.release_notes:
Matching with library variables is shipped! 🎉

What's changed:
• Added a feature of marching colors with variables from connected libraries.
• Removed duplicate entries when colors were transformed into themselves.
• Added tooltips for variable boxes to improve clarity.
• Multiple minor UX fixes.
135408.tagline: Merge similar color shades together and connect with variables in 1 click

plugins.name: Designer Starter Kit
plugins.description:
Start your design projects with a consistent structure. This plugin helps new designers build out essential project pages quickly and efficiently, ensuring uniformity across files. Customize page names, order, and background colors, and even save up to five configurations for future projects.


—


How to Use?

  1. Input the desired names for each page.
  2. Add, remove or reorganize pages as needed.
  3. Save your setup as a configuration for later use or stick with the default.


*Included a basic structure for Design Systems & Design Research


—


Made with ❤️ in México using Cursor AI and Claude 3.5. Feedback is appreciated —thank you!

plugins.name: Caravage
plugins.description:
Check easily your design contrast accessibility with the 3.0 Web Content Accessibility Guidelines.


About

Caravage allows you to check easily your design contrast accessibility with the 3.0 Web Content Accessibility Guidelines.


You can either select individually any text layer or scan a selection and the plugin will automatically give you for each text:

  1. The colour(s) of the text.
  2. The colour(s) of the background directly behind the text.
  3. The font size and weight of the text.
  4. The contrast value based on WCAG 3.0 (Web Content Accessibility Guidelines) and the new colour contrast method called APCA (Accessible Perceptual Contrast Algorithm).
  5. The minimum contrast value provided by the APCA contrast look up table.


Credits

  1. This plugin was inspired by another plugin called Contrast.
  2. This plugin use the Accessible Perceptual Contrast Algorithm by Andrew Somers.
  3. This plugin use RGBQuant to analyze the colour(s) of the selected text and the background behind it.
  4. This plugin use Figma Plugin DS, a lightweight UI library.
plugins.tagline: Check easily your design contrast accessibility with the 3.0 Web Content Accessibility Guidelines

117095.name: Caravage
117095.description:

  4. The contrast value based on WCAG 3.0 (Web Content Accessibility Guidelines) and the new colour contrast method called APCA (Accessible Perceptual Contrast Algorithm).

Credits

  3. This plugin use RGBQuant to analyze the colour(s) of the selected text and the background behind it.

117095.release_notes: Fix issue with the scan feature where nodes were not selectable.
117095.tagline: Check easily your design contrast accessibility with the 3.0 Web Content Accessibility Guidelines

plugins.name: Pix2Text — Extract editable text from images
plugins.description:
Pix2Text lets you upload or drag an image into Figma and instantly extract the text it contains — turning it into a fully editable text layer.


🪄 How to use


1. Drag and drop or upload a JPG or PNG image

2. Select the language of the text in the image

3. Click "Extract text"

4. That’s it! The text will appear as an editable layer in Figma ✨


🚀 Features


- Extract text from JPG or PNG images

- Language selector: English, Español, Deutsch, Português

- One-click extraction

- Fully local and private (no internet required)

- No registration or login needed

- Powered by Tesseract.js


🔐 Privacy


All processing is done locally in your browser.

Your image never leaves your computer.


☕ Fuel for more resources

Built by a designer playing with code → Buy me a coffee

accepted.name: Ana Montes
accepted.description: I know what you did with that last detached component.

plugins.tagline: Extract text from images and insert it as editable text in Figma in seconds.

plugins.description:
TEXT BLOCK is a simple yet powerful Figma plugin that helps you create structured and consistent text blocks effortlessly.

To get started,

select at least two text layers in your design.

Then, choose from four stylish presets: Compact, Loose, Stacked, or Layered. Customize the block width and line spacing to perfectly fit your layout.

plugins.name: Layout Switch
plugins.description:
Layout Switch will help you save 95% of your time in switching your UI layouts from LTR layout to RTL or vise versa! Select how many frames you want and choose your destination layout and click on the button. BOOOOM! all the layouts are changed!

Layout Switch is your ultimate Figma plugin for effortlessly converting designs between left-to-right (LTR) and right-to-left (RTL) layouts. Whether you're adapting English designs for Arabic, Persian, or Hebrew, or flipping RTL layouts back to LTR, this plugin makes the process fast, precise, and hassle-free. With support for multiple frames at once, Layout Switch is the perfect tool for designers working on global projects.


🖼️ Multi-Frame Support:

Select a single frame or a bunch of frames at once! The plugin handles multiple selections effortlessly, making it perfect for large projects with numerous screens or components.


✨ Blazing Fast Conversion:

Transform your designs in seconds—no more wasting time on manual tweaks. Whether you're converting LTR to RTL or RTL to LTR, it’s as fast as a blink!


🛠️ Easy to Use:

No complex settings or learning curves. Just select your frames, choose your direction (LTR to RTL or RTL to LTR), click "Convert," and watch the magic happen. We also have two side-plugins that run directly!


🌍 Bidirectional Flexibility:

Works seamlessly in both directions—convert LTR to RTL for Arabic, Persian, or Hebrew, or flip RTL layouts back to LTR for English or other left-writing languages.


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


How It Works:

1.Select Frames: Choose one or multiple frames in your Figma project.

2.Choose Direction: Select whether you want to convert LTR to RTL or RTL to LTR.

3.Click on Change Direction: Run the plugin and let it flip your designs instantly.

4.Review & Polish: Enjoy perfectly adapted layouts, ready for further refinement or delivery.


Note: You save at least 95% your time changing layouts by using Layout Switch. Put your 5% effort on little handy modification😉

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Why Choose Layout Switch?

•Save Time: What used to take hours or days now takes seconds.

•Boost Productivity: Focus on creativity, not manual adjustments.

•Global Reach: Effortlessly design for both LTR and RTL languages, including Arabic, Persian, Hebrew, and more.

•Bidirectional Power: The only plugin you’ll need for flipping designs in both directions.



Perfect For:

•Designers working on multilingual or global projects.

•Teams adapting designs for Arabic, Persian, Hebrew, English, or other bidirectional languages.

•Anyone looking to streamline their Figma workflow and save time.



Get Started Now!

Stop struggling with manual conversions. Layout Switch is here to make your design process faster, smarter, and more efficient. Whether you're flipping LTR to RTL or RTL to LTR, this plugin has you covered. Try it today and see the difference!



Support the Plugin

❤️ Love Layout Switch?

If this plugin has made your design process easier, consider supporting its development with a small donation. Your contribution helps keep the plugin updated and free for everyone!

👉 https://ko-fi.com/sabnouri


Have Questions or Suggestions?


We’d love to hear from you! Whether you have feedback, suggestions for new features, or just need help, feel free to reach out.

📧 Contact Us: sabernooriusb@gmail.com

🌐 Check my website at: https://designbysab.webflow.io
plugins.tagline: LTR or RTL? Switch in a flash—best for Arabic, Persian, and beyond! Convert 1000 frames at a run!

•Boost Productivity: Focus on creativity, not manual adjustments.

•Global Reach: Effortlessly design for both LTR and RTL languages, including Arabic, Persian, Hebrew, and more.

•Bidirectional Power: The only plugin you’ll need for flipping designs in both directions.



Perfect For:

•Designers working on multilingual or global projects.

•Teams adapting designs for Arabic, Persian, Hebrew, English, or other bidirectional languages.

•Anyone looking to streamline their Figma workflow and save time.



Get Started Now!

Stop struggling with manual conversions. Layout Switch is here to make your design process faster, smarter, and more efficient. Whether you're flipping LTR to RTL or RTL to LTR, this plugin has you covered. Try it today and see the difference!



Support the Plugin

❤️ Love Layout Switch?

If this plugin has made your design process easier, consider supporting its development with a small donation. Your contribution helps keep the plugin updated and free for everyone!

👉 https://ko-fi.com/sabnouri


Have Questions or Suggestions?


We’d love to hear from you! Whether you have feedback, suggestions for new features, or just need help, feel free to reach out.

📧 Contact Us: sabernooriusb@gmail.com

🌐 Check my website at: https://designbysab.webflow.io
118139.release_notes: This is the first version we released. We will upgrade the plugin later with new and better features.
118139.tagline: LTR or RTL? Switch in a flash—best for Arabic, Persian, and beyond! Convert 1000 frames at a run!

plugins.name: Sheets <> Variables
plugins.description:
The Sheets <> Variables plugin empowers designers to integrate dynamic data from Google Sheets directly into Figma. By mapping spreadsheet tabs to variable collections, rows to variables, and columns to modes, this plugin ensures your designs stay up-to-date with your data sources.


Easily manage multilingual content, currency formats, and more, all within Figma.

See use case from https://www.figma.com/community/file/1466349243602774962/sheets-variables-doc

plugins.name: Conway's Game of Life
plugins.description: If a section or frame is selected, this plugin will fill it with random cells and iterate through Conway's Game of Life.

95098.description: If a section or frame is selected, this plugin will fill it with random cells and iterate through Conway's Game of Life.

plugins.name: Dynogee Image Rendering API
plugins.description:
Dynogee is an easy and quick tool to expose your Figma designs as an API:


  1. ✨ Swap text and images with dynamic content
  2. 📐 Create pixel perfect copies of your design
  3. 🏎️ Supa-fast rendering times, render images on-the-fly
  4. 🚀 We thought of it: custom fonts, truncation, i18n, you name it


It’s like Figma's Export feature, but as an API. 💫


How to use the plugin


  1. Select a frame in Figma, and open the plugin
  2. Define layers for which you want to provide content via the API
  3. Create your template 🚀


Pro tip: Set a max height on text layers to enforce truncation. ✂️


Features


Full creative freedom

Use your brand fonts, colors and more to create high-fidelity dynamic images ✨


Fast rendering

Our backend is optimized to generate and distribute your images without long wait times. Often images are generated in as little as 200ms.


Handoff your templates to developers

Each template your create comes with it's own documentation and playground environment, making it trivial for your engineering team to make use of the image rendering API.


Contact


If you want to share your feedback, please reach out to us at support@dynogee.com.
plugins.tagline: Turn your Figma frames into an image rendering API

124922.name: Dynogee Image Rendering API
124922.description:
Dynogee is an easy and quick tool to expose your Figma designs as an API:


  1. ✨ Swap text and images with dynamic content
  2. 📐 Create pixel perfect copies of your design
  3. 🏎️ Supa-fast rendering times, render images on-the-fly
  4. 🚀 We thought of it: custom fonts, truncation, i18n, you name it


It’s like Figma's Export feature, but as an API. 💫


How to use the plugin


  1. Select a frame in Figma, and open the plugin
  2. Define layers for which you want to provide content via the API
  3. Create your template 🚀


Pro tip: Set a max height on text layers to enforce truncation. ✂️


Features


Full creative freedom

Use your brand fonts, colors and more to create high-fidelity dynamic images ✨


Fast rendering

Our backend is optimized to generate and distribute your images without long wait times. Often images are generated in as little as 200ms.


Handoff your templates to developers

Each template your create comes with it's own documentation and playground environment, making it trivial for your engineering team to make use of the image rendering API.


Contact


If you want to share your feedback, please reach out to us at support@dynogee.com.
124922.tagline: Turn your Figma frames into an image rendering API

plugins.name: Spymaster
plugins.description: Use this plugin to generate a 5x5 grid of words that are secretly assigned to either the red or blue team. Spymasters have a separate page where they can view a map of the assigned colors and give clues to their team to guess which words belong to which team.

plugins.name: Auto Layer Numbering
plugins.description:
Auto Page Number


Automatically add and update page numbers in your Figma documents with ease!


Overview:

Auto Page Number is a Figma plugin designed to streamline your workflow when working with multi-frame projects. Instead of manually adding page numbers to each frame, this plugin automatically generates and updates them for you. Simply input your desired text layer name (default is "pageNumber"), and with a single click, the plugin will create or update the numbering across all frames in your document.
plugins.tagline: Automatically add and update page numbers in your Figma documents with ease!

118191.name: Auto Layer Numbering
118191.description:
Auto Page Number


Automatically add and update page numbers in your Figma documents with ease!


Overview:

Auto Page Number is a Figma plugin designed to streamline your workflow when working with multi-frame projects. Instead of manually adding page numbers to each frame, this plugin automatically generates and updates them for you. Simply input your desired text layer name (default is "pageNumber"), and with a single click, the plugin will create or update the numbering across all frames in your document.
118191.tagline: Automatically add and update page numbers in your Figma documents with ease!

plugins.name: Improved Exporter
plugins.description: Improved Exporter is the essential Figma plugin for creators who need total control over their exports. Whether you're designing for print or the web, this tool lets you customize DPI, scale to pixel-perfect dimensions, and export in all major file formats, including .PNG, .JPEG, .SVG, .PDF, and .WEBP. Save time, avoid third-party apps, and ensure your designs look flawless anywhere they go. Perfect for print designers, web developers, and anyone looking to streamline their workflow.
plugins.tagline: Seamless Export Solutions for Designers.

113104.description: Improved Exporter is the essential Figma plugin for creators who need total control over their exports. Whether you're designing for print or the web, this tool lets you customize DPI, scale to pixel-perfect dimensions, and export in all major file formats, including .PNG, .JPEG, .SVG, .PDF, and .WEBP. plugins.name: Handoff
plugins.description:
Design 🤝 Dev Handoff


Design to dev done right. A Figma plugin to turn design variabes + styles into Tailwind & POSTCSS.


Learn more on Github.


Features


- Convert Figma variables + styles to Tailwind config variables

- Convert Figma text styles to POSTCSS syntax with responsive media queries

- Consolidate design + dev tokens into one source of truth, extensible by designers and developers


Usage


1. Install the plugin from the Figma Community

2. Open the plugin from the Figma toolbar

3. Generate handoff files (.json and .postcss) from the plugin

4. Pass files to developers to integrate into their Tailwind config and Tailwind `@component` layers


Text Styles


The plugin will convert Figma text styles to POSTCSS syntax with responsive media queries. The plugin will also generate a JSON file with the font sizes. The plugin is opinionated as to what gets converted to a class, so it's recommended to review the generated POSTCSS file and adjust as needed.


The POSTCSS file will work from the smallest breakpoint to the largest, assigning media queries using Tailwind's `screen` function as breakpoints appear. Properties are diffed to the base style and only novel properties are added to the media query.

.body-1 {
font-family: Inter;
font-size: 16px;
line-height: 24px;
font-weight: 400;
letter-spacing: 0.5px;

@media screen(md) {
font-size: 2.75rem;
}

@media screen(lg) {
font-size: 3.5rem;
}
}


Naming Schema


The naming schema works so that we capture only the most important classes. For the sake of brevity, we only capture the default classes, defined as not having any variants or as being named the `default` variant.


{viewport}/{style}/{variant}


- `viewport` - The viewport size in Tailwind syntax (e.g. `sm`, `md`, `lg`, `xl`). This corresponds directly to the `Screens` variables, so a matching entry should exist in that variable collection.

- `style` - The Figma text style name, such as `display-1` or `body-3`. This is semantic and can be named anything, but it should be consistent across the design system. The styles for this should be the _default_ styles, as in the most common styles used in the design system for this type of text.

- `variant` - The variant of the style in semantic or property synax, such as `bold`, `italic`, `uppercase`, `lowercase`, `capitalize`, `normal`, `underline`, `line-through`, `no-underline`. This is optional and can be omitted if the style does not have a variant. NOTE: A `default` style MUST be named here in order to be converted to POSTCSS (ex: `md/body-3/default`).


Variables


The plugin will convert Figma variables and effects styles to Tailwind config variables via a resulting JSON file matching the Tailwind configuration. The plugin is optimized to account for a few key properties such as `screens`, `spacing`, `backdropBlur`, `blur`, `borderRadius`, etc, which are numbers converted specially to corresponding formats. The ability to customize a properties format is in the works. Need it sooner? Open an issue and we can prioritize it.


NOTE Library names *must* match the proper Tailwind config name in order to extend the configuration properly.


{
"colors": {
"primary": "#FF0000",
"secondary": "#00FF00",
"tertiary": "#0000FF"
},
"spacing": {
"1": "0.25rem",
"2": "0.5rem",
"3": "0.75rem"
},
"screens": {
"sm": "640px",
"md": "768px",
"lg": "1024px",
"xl": "1280px"
}
}

accepted.name: The DataFace
accepted.description: A digital agency, specializing in data visualization

plugins.tagline: Design to dev with Tailwind in mind

plugins.name: AppStore Screenshot Icon Hunter
plugins.description:
A Figma plugin for automatically retrieving and laying out App Store app screenshots.


Key Features

•Support searching for apps by name or App ID

•Automatically fetch high-resolution app screenshots

•Support multiple data sources (App Store API, iTunes Search API)

•Automatically create beautiful layouts

•Display download progress in real time

•Support customizing icon sizes and spacing


Usage

1.Install the plugin in Figma

2.Search for the app by name or App ID

3.Select the target app

4.Configure layout parameters (optional)

5.Click the “Collect & Package” button

6.Wait for screenshot download and layout completion
plugins.tagline: Automatically fetch high-resolution app screenshots&icon

119793.name: AppStore Screenshot Icon Hunter
119793.description:
A Figma plugin for automatically retrieving and laying out App Store app screenshots.


Key Features

•Support searching for apps by name or App ID

•Automatically fetch high-resolution app screenshots

•Support multiple data sources (App Store API, iTunes Search API)

•Automatically create beautiful layouts

•Display download progress in real time

•Support customizing icon sizes and spacing


Usage

2.Search for the app by name or App ID

3.Select the target app

4.Configure layout parameters (optional)

5.Click the “Collect & Package” button

6.Wait for screenshot download and layout completion

plugins.name: Random values generator
plugins.description:
This plugin is created to help you save time and speed up productivity by allowing you generate random values with just a click.

You can quickly create numeric, alphanumeric, or pattern-based random values.

Whether you’re prototyping, testing input fields, or designing layouts, this plugin ensures precision and speed by generating values tailored to your needs.


How to use

  1. Run the Random Values generator plugin
  2. Select one or multiple text layers
  3. Select the type of values you want, enter your preferred number of character and click on ‘Generate values”
  4. The pattern-based values allow you to define the format in which random values are generated. For example, by using "X" for random alphabets and "#" for random numbers, you can control the structure of the output. Separators such as - (dash), . (dot), and _ (underscore) can also be included to customize the format further.

Example Patterns:

X#XX## could generate D3FR53.

##XX#X-XX## could generate 06CO2M-FC92.

This feature allows you to create structured, randomized values for placeholders, tokens, or testing data with ease.


Use cases:

  1. Populating Placeholder Data : Use the plugin to generate realistic placeholder values for prototypes, such as: Unique identifiers (e.g., serial numbers, order numbers, or product codes).
  2. Form fields like usernames, passwords, or verification codes
  3. Generate unique codes and simulate real world data: Generate pattern-based values to mimic specific real-world data, such as: License plates, invoice numbers, customer IDs, coupons, gift card, events tickets
  4. Testing UI scalability: Check how your designs handle varying lengths and types of values, ensuring components like input fields, labels, and tables remain responsive and visually consistent.


Need any help or have questions? Please reach out


Show me some support
plugins.tagline: Generate random values for your project

136515.name: Random values generator
136515.description:

plugins.name: Dash Line Rotator
plugins.description: The Dash Line Rotator is a Figma plugin designed to enhance your design workflow by allowing users to easily rotate dashed lines around various shapes. With a user-friendly interface featuring a real-time slider for angle adjustments, this plugin ensures that dashes maintain their alignment and properties while following the contours of rectangles, ellipses, polygons, and pen tool paths. Whether you're creating intricate designs or simple graphics, the Dashed Lines Rotator streamlines the process, providing a seamless experience for designers looking to add dynamic elements to their projects.
plugins.tagline: Works for all shapes

125300.name: Dash Line Rotator
125300.description: The Dash Line Rotator is a Figma plugin designed to enhance your design workflow by allowing users to easily rotate dashed lines around various shapes. With a user-friendly interface featuring a real-time slider for angle adjustments, this plugin ensures that dashes maintain their alignment and properties while following the contours of rectangles, ellipses, polygons, and pen tool paths. Whether you're creating intricate designs or simple graphics, the Dashed Lines Rotator streamlines the process, providing a seamless experience for designers looking to add dynamic elements to their projects.

plugins.name: Numeric Tokens Generator
plugins.description:
Transform your design workflow with a comprehensive design system generator that creates and manages typography, spacing, border radius, and shadow systems - all powered by Figma variables.


Key Features:

📝 Complete Typography System

  1. Generate responsive typography scales with Material Design or Apple HIG guidelines
  2. Smart font pairing validation for optimal readability
  3. Automatic variable creation for font sizes and line heights
  4. Support for custom type scales and base sizes
  5. Responsive typography with desktop, tablet, and mobile variants (Pro)


↔️ Spacing System

  1. Create consistent spacing scales based on 4px or 8px grids
  2. Generate spacing variables for margins, padding, and layout
  3. Customizable number of spacing increments
  4. Visual preview of spacing values


⚪ Border Radius System

  1. Build systematic border radius scales
  2. Customizable base radius and increments
  3. Visual preview of radius values
  4. Perfect for maintaining consistent component shapes


🎭 Shadow System

  1. Create elevation-based shadow systems
  2. Customizable shadow properties (color, blur, spread)
  3. Visual angle control for consistent light sources
  4. Perfect for depth and hierarchy


📤 Export Options

  1. Web: CSS, SCSS, JSON
  2. Mobile: React Native, Flutter, Android XML, Swift
  3. Variables-first approach for easy updates
  4. Cross-platform consistency


📚 Auto-Documentation

  1. Generate visual documentation for your design system
  2. Automatic style guides with examples
  3. Clear naming conventions
  4. Easy team handoff


🔄 Smart Updates

  1. Detect existing settings
  2. Update system-wide changes through variables
  3. Maintain consistency across your design files


Perfect for design system creators, UI designers, and teams looking to maintain consistent, scalable design systems across web and mobile platforms.

accepted.name: Maher Fayad
accepted.description: Senior UX Designer | Transforming Products. Empowering Leaders. 40+ Success Stories. Let's Innovate Together.

plugins.tagline: Typography, Radius, Tokens Generator, Variables, Numeric Tokes, Design system

plugins.name: pluckpluck
plugins.description:
A plugin that just plucks everything from one side of the cursor. Great for making room for that extra page in a flow.


Right click context menu, or simplest ctrl+, cmd+, search for 'pluck'.


Known issue:

If you hold down the right mouse button as you go through the menus, the selection will be wrong, since you moved the mouse sideways. Click and release, then go through the menus.


Will only select items that are frames or layers on the canvas.


Or do the quick action menu: ctrl/cmd+,
plugins.tagline: Pick up and move. Faster.

70974.name: pluckpluck
70974.description:
A plugin that just plucks everything from one side of the cursor. Great for making room for that extra page in a flow.


Right click context menu, or simplest ctrl+, cmd+, search for 'pluck'.


Known issue:

If you hold down the right mouse button as you go through the menus, the selection will be wrong, since you moved the mouse sideways. Click and release, then go through the menus.


Will only select items that are frames or layers on the canvas.


Or do the quick action menu: ctrl/cmd+,

plugins.name: Reset Corner Radius
plugins.description:
This plugin allows you to reset all rounded corners to 0 in the selected layers with a single click. It works not only on individual layers but also within groups and components, ensuring that any nested layers with rounded corners are also reset.


How to use:

  1. Select a layer or frame.
  2. Run the plugin.
  3. All rounded corners in the selected layer and its nested layers will be reset to 0.
plugins.tagline: Reset all rounded corners in selected layers instantly.

122410.name: Reset Corner Radius
122410.description:
This plugin allows you to reset all rounded corners to 0 in the selected layers with a single click. It works not only on individual layers but also within groups and components, ensuring that any nested layers with rounded corners are also reset.


How to use:

  1. Select a layer or frame.
  2. Run the plugin.
  3. All rounded corners in the selected layer and its nested layers will be reset to 0.
122410.release_notes: Added: A relaunch button to re-execute the plugin.
122410.tagline: Reset all rounded corners in selected layers instantly.

accepted.description: Product Desig Engineer living in Stockholm

plugins.tagline: A physics-powered Figma canvas

plugins.name: IMG color extractor
plugins.description:
🎨 IMG Color Extractor

IMG Color Extractor es una herramienta diseñada para obtener la paleta de colores a partir de cualquier imagen. Mapea e identifica el color dominante y los secundarios según su presencia en la imagen.

Ya sea que estés creando un sistema de diseño, buscando inspiración para un nuevo proyecto o documentando colores, IMG Color Extractor simplifica tu trabajo, permitiéndote ahorrar tiempo y enfocarte en lo que realmente importa: la creatividad. ✨


Características Principales

  1. 🌈 Extracción de Colores Precisa: Carga cualquier imagen (incluso formatos como WebP o SVG) y obtén el color dominante junto con una paleta secundaria, generada con la tecnología de Color Thief.
  2. 📋 Copia Rápida al Portapapeles: Haz clic en cualquier bloque de color y copia su valor hexadecimal para usarlo directamente en tu diseño.
  3. 🖌️ Creación de Estilos Agrupados: Envía la paleta generada a la librería de estilos de Figma con un solo clic, agrupando los colores bajo el nombre "IMGColorExtrator".


¿Cómo usarlo?

  1. Carga tu Imagen: Haz clic en "Seleccionar imagen" y carga cualquier imagen desde tu dispositivo.
  2. Visualiza la Paleta: La herramienta identifica el color dominante y los colores secundarios, mostrándolos como bloques interactivos para que puedas analizarlos fácilmente.
  3. Copia los Colores o Exporta a Figma: Haz clic en cualquier bloque de color para copiar su valor hexadecimal al portapapeles. Presiona el botón "Enviar a mis estilos" para exportar la paleta a la librería de estilos en Figma, lista para ser reutilizada en tus proyectos.


Mejoras? Claro que si! déjame tus comentarios y recomendaciones. 🚀
plugins.tagline: Extrae la paleta de colores dominante y secundaria de cualquier imagen

plugins.name: Chrome to Figma
plugins.description:
Directly save Image or Svg from Chrome to Figma without downloading it to computer.



How to setup:

Install plugin

Install Chrome Extension

Copy Link ID to Extension


When Chrome Extension and Figma plugin is running, use "Save Image As..." or website native download feature to transfer image to Figma file without downloading it to computer.


Free plan - import 30 images/month

Paid plan - import unlimited images
plugins.tagline: Save any image from website to Figma
